Factor Model

Source: vignettes/transformations_factor_model.qmd

Transformation

Ŝ(θ)=ΛΨΛ⊤+Θ \hat{S}(\theta) = \Lambda \Psi \Lambda^\top + \Theta

Update of the gradient

ΔΛ=2ΔŜ(θ)ΛΨ \Delta_{\Lambda} = 2\Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \Lambda \Psi

ΔΨ=Λ⊤ΔŜ(θ)Λ \Delta_{\Psi} = \Lambda^\top \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \Lambda

ΔΘ=ΔŜ(θ) \Delta_{\Theta} = \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)}

Update of the differential

∂ΔŜ(θ)=∂ΛΨΛ⊤+Λ∂ΨΛ⊤+ΛΨ∂Λ⊤+∂Θ \partial \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} = \partial \Lambda \Psi \Lambda^\top + \Lambda \partial \Psi \Lambda^\top + \Lambda \Psi \partial \Lambda^\top + \partial \Theta

Update of the differential of the gradient

∂ΔΛ=2(∂ΔŜ(θ)ΛΨ+ΔŜ(θ)(∂ΛΨ+Λ∂Ψ)) \partial \Delta_{\Lambda} = 2\left( \partial \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \Lambda \Psi + \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \big(\partial \Lambda \Psi + \Lambda \partial\Psi \big) \right)

∂ΔΨ=∂Λ⊤ΔŜ(θ)Λ+Λ⊤∂ΔŜ(θ)Λ+Λ⊤ΔŜ(θ)∂Λ \partial \Delta_{\Psi} = \partial \Lambda^\top \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \Lambda + \Lambda^\top \partial \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \Lambda + \Lambda^\top \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)} \partial \Lambda

∂ΔΘ=∂ΔŜ(θ) \partial \Delta_{\Theta} = \partial \Delta_{\hat{S}(\theta)}

Jacobian

JΛ=(ΛΨ)⊤⊗Ip J_\Lambda = \big(\Lambda \Psi \big)^\top \otimes I_p

JΨ=Λ⊗Λ J_\Psi = \Lambda \otimes \Lambda

JΨ=Ip2×p2 J_\Psi = I_{p^2\times p^2}

Differential of the jacobian towards the gradient

Constraints

Constraints’ derivatives
